knowledge.title: Ancient Coin
knowledge.description: A damaged coin, from an older period.

knowledge.title: Coin Depicting a Musical Diet
knowledge.description: A damaged coin, from an older period. Looks to Present some kind of Deity associated with a musical instrument.

knowledge.title: Coin Depicting the God Apollo
knowledge.description: A damaged coin, from an older period. Looks to Present the Greek God Apollo with a musical instrument.

knowledge.title: Ancient Greek Coin
knowledge.description: A damaged coin, from an older period. Looks to Present the Greek God Apollo with a musical instrument. Occured around 450 BCE in Ancient Greece.

knowledge.title: Ancient Coin
knowledge.description: A damaged coin, from an older period.

knowledge.title: Ancient Coin with a Latin Inscription
knowledge.description: A damaged coin, from an older period. Includes inscriptions in Latin.

knowledge.title: Coin Depecting Grant Latin Era Figures
knowledge.description: A damaged coin, from an older period. Includes inscriptions in Latin and Grant Figures of a Latin Period.

knowledge.title: Ancient Roman Coin
knowledge.description: A damaged coin, from an older period. Includes inscriptions in Latin and Grant Figures from the Ancient Roman Period. It existed around 69 - 96 CE.

knowledge.title: Ancient Coin
knowledge.description: A damaged coin, from an older period.

knowledge.title: Coin of a Christian Design
knowledge.description: A damaged coin, from an older period. Seems to follow a christian design.

knowledge.title: Byzantine Coin
knowledge.description: A damaged coin, from an older period. Seems to follow a christian design, common in the Byzantine Empire of 491 CE.

knowledge.title: Ancient Coin
knowledge.description: A curious coin.

knowledge.title: Ancient Coin with a Square Hole
knowledge.description: A curious coin, with a square cut in the center. Characters seem to follow an Asian tradition.

knowledge.title: Ancient Chinese Coin
knowledge.description: A curious coin, with a square cut in the center. Chinese Characters are present. Design appears around 300 - 220 BCE.

knowledge.title: Ancient Coin
knowledge.description: A damaged Ancient Coin.

knowledge.title: Owl Ancient Coin
knowledge.description: A coin depecting an owl. In some cultures, owls where a sign of wisdom.

knowledge.title: Ancient Athenian Coin
knowledge.description: A coin depecting an owl. In Ancient Athens culture, owls where a sign of wisdom. Coins of this type appeared around 454 - 404 BCE.

knowledge.title: Bronze Key
knowledge.description: A key made of bronze. It was found in a filing cabinet drawer.

knowledge.title: Ancient Athens Note
knowledge.description: A weathered note. It reads: In Ancient Athens, various animals symbolized specific Character Traits. Athena, the Goddess of Wisdom, was often portrayed by an Owl. This kind of Symbology has been found in many forms of art, including plates, vases, and coins.

knowledge.title: Key
knowledge.description: A basic key. It was found on a sink.

knowledge.title: Public Restroom Door Key
knowledge.description: A basic key for the Restroom Door. It was found on the sink.

knowledge.title: Byzantine Book
knowledge.description: An old book. Seems to refer to the Byzantine Empire.

knowledge.title: Roman Note
knowledge.description: A note on Roman Period coins. It reads: Roman Empire coinage included inscriptions of Grant Figures of the Period, with Latin adorning the other side. Major examples are from around 69 - 96 CE.

knowledge.title: Chinese Three Kingdoms Book
knowledge.description: A book on the Three Kingdoms Period of Ancient China. Includes small references to the coinage of the period, with a description of designs of Ban Liang in the early years of 300 - 220 BCE.

knowledge.title: Scroll of Ancient Greek History
knowledge.description: This scroll -though weathered- mentions the monetary system of the broader region of Ancient Greece. Mostly describes coins of the period around 450 BCE.
